item.title: Projections
item.description: Projections Let’s talk about projections! We need projections to create an actual map. Geospatial data is usally in the form of latitude and longitude but in the browser we don’t have these concepts. We only have x and y coordinates. Goal: Our goal is to transform geo-coordinates to screen-coordinates. Projections are just math.
